metadata.title: 价格行为交易
metadata.description: ShipAny is a NextJS boilerplate for building AI SaaS startups, Ship Fast with a variety of templates and components.
metadata.keywords: ShipAny, AI SaaS Boilerplate, NextJS Boilerplate

hero.title: Build and Ship Your AI SaaS in Hours, Not Weeks.
hero.description: With our Next.js boilerplate, you get a production-ready foundation with all the features you need to launch your AI startup quickly and efficiently.

features.title: All The Features You Need
features.description: ShipAny comes with a complete set of features to help you build and scale your AI SaaS.

database.title: Database
database.description: Integrated with Drizzle ORM for easy database management.

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: Stripe integration for seamless payment processing.

ai_integration.title: AI Integration
ai_integration.description: Easily integrate with various AI models and services.

multi_tenancy.title: Admin
multi_tenancy.description: Admin system for easy user and resource management.

cta.title: Ready to Launch Your AI Idea?
cta.description: Don't waste time on boilerplate code. Focus on what makes your product unique. Get ShipAny and start building today.

api_keys.title: API Keys
api_keys.tip: Please keep your apikey safe to avoid leaks

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: News, resources, and updates about ShipAny

my_invites.title: My Invites
my_invites.invite_tip: Invite 1 friend to buy ShipAny, reward $50.
my_invites.no_orders: You can't invite others before you bought ShipAny
my_invites.no_affiliates: You're not allowed to invite others, please contact us to apply for permission.

feedback.title: Feedback
feedback.description: We'd love to hear what went well or how we can improve the product experience.
feedback.rating_tip: How do you feel about ShipAny?
